quote_first: Punctual as always, Monsignor Kevin Sullivan was in the chandeliered lobby of the Hilton at
quote_last: , when Jon and Shannon stepped off the elevator. This time nattily attired in clerical grays, the dark-haired, ruddy-faced son of Ireland gracefully kissed Shannon’s hand and then squeezed Jon’s.
title: The Constantine Codex
author: Paul L. Maier
